hero.subtitle: A starter kit for building high-performance applications with Turborepo. Scale your codebase using our optimized monorepo structure.

features.subtitle: Our monorepo starter comes pre-configured with all the tools you need for a professional development workflow.

items.ts: Strongly typed JavaScript for better developer experience and fewer bugs.
items.eslint: Static code analysis to identify problematic patterns and enforce code style.
items.prettier: Opinionated code formatter to ensure consistent code style across your codebase.

items.svelteKit: The fastest way to build Svelte apps with filesystem-based routing and server-side rendering.
items.tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces.
items.bitsUI: Unstyled, accessible UI components for Svelte with a focus on flexibility and developer experience.

items.hono: Ultrafast web framework for the Edges. Lightweight and performance-focused.
items.orval: TypeScript client generator from OpenAPI specifications with runtime validation and type safety.
items.drizzle: TypeScript ORM with a focus on type-safety, performance and developer experience.
items.tanstack: Powerful asynchronous state management for fetching, caching, and updating server state.

items.turborepo: High-performance build system for JavaScript and TypeScript codebases with intelligent caching.
items.pnpm: Fast, disk space efficient package manager with built-in monorepo support.
items.docker: Containerized development environment for consistent development across all machines.
